name: Arrange Tabs
desc: Want to play your favorite song but cant find the tabs? I will translate any song to sheet tabs so that you can play them.

name: Beginners course on guitar
desc: A simple 3 week course to get you started with guitar playing. Covering all the basics from strumming to simple scales and chords.

name: Advanced guitarist course
desc: An advanced electric guitar course aimed at experienced players who want to take guitar playing seriously and break in the music industry.
